remarks: Values for the group multiple function in a restricted structure (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 14-Jun-2017.)
statement:
ressmulgnn.1 $e |- H = ( G |`s A ) $.
ressmulgnn.2 $e |- A C_ ( Base ` G ) $.
ressmulgnn.3 $e |- .* = ( .g ` G ) $.
ressmulgnn.4 $e |- I = ( invg ` G ) $.
ressmulgnn0.4 $e |- ( 0g ` G ) = ( 0g ` H ) $.
ressmulgnn0 $p |- ( ( N e. NN0 /\ X e. A ) -> ( N ( .g ` H ) X ) = ( N .* X ) ) $.
